title: Windows 7 Ultimate SP1 X86 X64 ESD en-US April 2015 by Generatio
description:
* Windows 7 Ultimate SP1 X86 X64 ESD en-US April 2015


[ RELEASE INFO ]


* File: Win7.AIO.ESD.en-US.Apr2015.iso

* Source 32bit: X17-59463 & dvd 677710
* Source 64bit: X17-59465 & dvd 677651

* Size: 4,44GB
* Format: Bootable ISO

* CRC32: 0862ca51
* MD5: 3da908d07c25d95db321692531e56729
* SHA-1: 5ae9344d6c7f9101c750cec52e9721be2a6ced27

* Language: en-US [English - USA]

[ EDITIONS INCLUDED ]

* 32bit:
* Windows 7 Home Premium
* Windows 7 Professional
* Windows 7 Enterprise
* Windows 7 Ultimate
* Windows 7 Home Premium - -Pre-Activated
* Windows 7 Professional - - - -Pre-Activated
* Windows 7 Enterprise - - - - - Pre-Activated
* Windows 7 Ultimate - - - - - - Pre-Activated

* 64bit:
* Windows 7 Home Premium
* Windows 7 Professional
* Windows 7 Enterprise
* Windows 7 Ultimate
* Windows 7 Home Premium - -Pre-Activated
* Windows 7 Professional - - - -Pre-Activated
* Windows 7 Enterprise - - - - - Pre-Activated
* Windows 7 Ultimate - - - - - - Pre-Activated

[ CONTENTS ]

* Integrated / Pre-installed in Audit Mode:

* .NET Framework 4.5.2 Hotfix Rollup (KB3022670)
* Internet Explorer 11
* Hotfixes - 2015-04-14

* Setupcomplete / Post-install:

* NDP45-KB3037581
* KB890830
* Defender Updates

[ FEATURES ]

* Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset 8.1 (Microsoft DaRT)
* install.wim compressed to recovery format (install.esd)

* Activators:

* Daz Loader v2.2.2.0 & KMSpico v10.0.4 Portable Edition
[ Both potential False Positive Virus Alarm ]

[ INSTALLATION & INFORMATION ]

* A boot.wim from Win 8 is used to get Win 7 to work with ESD format.
* This makes setup resemble Win 8, but it is 100% Win 7.

* Create bootable USB (highly recommended) with Rufus,
* (attached) or burn to DVD at slow speed.

* NOTE!

* A restart is required to finalize the activation.
* sfc /scannow will fail due to replaced background.bmp.

* Hope you will enjoy this release!

* Regards,
* Generation2
